src:
Derbi kraj Morave pripao Borcu
Čačani uspeli da odbrane domaći teren od kvalitetnih Nikšićana - 81:69

07 Nov 2019

U derbiju 6. kola ABA 2 lige u dvorani kraj Morave sastali su se Borac i Sutjeska. Nakon 40 minuta odlične košarke na semaforu je stajalo 81:69 u korist domaćina. Na taj način tim Marka Marinovića je ostao neporažen na domaćem parketu. Takođe, ne manje važno je i to što su se ovim trijumfom Čačani zadržali u samom vrhu regionalnog takmičenja.
U skladu sa renomeom, timovi su od prvog sudijskog zvižduka su zaigrali košarku na jednom višem nivou. Međutim, prvi su gosti preuzeli inicijativu, pa su nakon nekoliko realizovanih napada stekli pristojnu prednost od osam poena (7:15). To je automatski nateralo trenera Marinovića da prekine seriju gostiju minutom odmora. Ipak, ulaskom Gavrilovića i Todorovića na parket stabilizovala se odbrana Borca, ali i napad je bolje funkcionisao, tako da je igra izgledala nešto bolje. Do isteka prvog kvartala Čačani su, na jedvite jade, ipa uspeli da poravnaju rezultat (21:21).
Drugi kvartal otvorio je Todorović pogotkom za tri, nagovestivši tako bolju igru u nastavku. Međutim, na žalost domaćih navijača to se nije odmah obistinilo. Borac je nastavio da se muči u napadu još nekoliko minuta, što je kao posledicu imalo rezultatski egal. Naravno, kvalitetna ekipa Sutjeske nije došla u Čačak turistički, već da pokaže šta zna i koliko može. Međutim, kada je Alikadić pogodio svoju prvu trojku na meču, atmosfera u hali postala je uzavrela, što je dalo potreban vetar u leđa domaćim igračima. Trener Sutjeske pokušao je to da prekine, ali uzalud. Odmah je Alikadić vezao još pet poena i tako odveo svoj tim na plus 10 (33:23). Zahvaljujući odličnoj igri, naročito raspoloženog Todorovića, Borac je na veliki odmor otišao mirne glave, zadovoljniji od protivnika i sa dvocifrenom prednošću.
Tokom trećeg dela igre timovi su igrali prilično ravnopravno. Sutjeska je napadala i pokušavala da ponovo meč uvede u rezultatski egal. Međutim, kako ni Borac nije zaostajao po kvalitetu igre, skor na tabeli ostajao je manje-više nepromenjen. Uprkos nastojanjima gostiju, Borac je pametnom igrom čuvao i sačuvao suficit stečen u prvom poluvremenu.
Poslednji kvartal gosti su zaigrali na sve ili ništa. Naravno, nisu imali šta da izgube, a mogli su mnogo da dobiju. I dobro su krenuli, pa su u jednom momentu prišli domaćinu na svega pet poena zaostatka (67:62), što je bila najmanja razlika još od druge četvrtine. Ali trener Marinović je shvatio da je situacija postala ozbiljna, pa je pozvao minut za savetovanje i odmor. Nije želeo da dozvoli da gosti kolo vode u Čačku. I publika je bila svesna da je pravi momenat da pojača intezitet navijanja, pa je tako i učinila. Nošen hukom sa tribina Džouns je povuka ekipu, ostali su ga sledili, pa je Borac ponovo stekao prednost od dve cifre (74:64). Od tog šoka Sutjeska nije mogla da se oporavi. Do poslednjeg minuta utakmice Borac je iskusno čuvao prednost, tako da je uspeo da ostvari novu, petu pobedu u ovogodišnjem izdanju ABA 2 lige.
I narednu utakmicu Borac igra u Čačku. U nedelju, u okviru KLS – a sa Dunavom.
ABA 2 liga – 6. kolo:
Sloboda T. - Široki 88:86*
Spars - Helios 70:71
Borac Č. - Sutjeska 81:69



Piše: Đurđe Mečanin/Nikola Minović
text:
The derby near Morava belongs to Fighter
Cacak managed to defend home field against quality Niksicans - 81:69

07 Nov 2019

Borac and Sutjeska met in the 6th round of the ABA 2 league in the hall near Morava. After 40 minutes of excellent basketball, the score was 81-69 in favor of the home side. In this way, Marko Marinovic's team remained undefeated on the home floor. Also, not less important is that with this triumph the Chachais kept themselves in the top of the regional competition.
In line with the renown, teams have played basketball at a higher level since the first referee whistle. However, the first guests took the initiative and after a few realized attacks gained a decent eight point lead (7:15). This automatically forced Coach Marinovic to interrupt the guest series with a minute's rest. However, with the entry of Gavrilovic and Todorovic on the parquet, the defense of Borac stabilized, but the attack worked better, so the game looked slightly better. By the end of the first quarter, the Cacak had even managed to settle the score (21:21).
The second quarter opened Todorovic with a three-pointer, hinting at a better game below. However, unfortunately for the home fans this was not immediately realized. The fighter continued to struggle in the attack for a few more minutes, resulting in a result egal. Of course, Sutjeska's quality team did not come to Cacak tourist, but to show what it knows and how much it can. However, when Alikadic hit his first three in the match, the atmosphere in the hall turned hot, which gave the necessary wind to the backs for the domestic players. Coach Sutjeske tried to break it, but in vain. Immediately, Alikadic tied five more points, taking his team to 10 (33:23). Thanks to the excellent game, especially Todorovic's mood, Borac went for a big break with calm heads, more satisfied than his opponents and with a double-digit advantage.
During the third part of the game the teams played pretty evenly. Sutjeska was attacking and trying to reintroduce the match to the result egal. However, even as Fighter did not lag behind in quality of play, the score on the table remained more or less unchanged. Despite the efforts of the guests, Fighter kept smart and kept the surplus gained in the first half with smart play.
For the last quarter guests have played all or nothing. Of course, they had nothing to lose, and they could gain a lot. They started well and at one point they came to the home side with just five points behind (67:62), which was the smallest difference since the second quarter. But Coach Marinovic realized that the situation was getting serious, so he called a minute for counseling and rest. He did not want to let the guests ride the wheel to Cacak. And the audience was aware that it was the right time to increase the intensity of the cheering, and so it did. Boomed from the stands by Jones, he pulled the team, the others followed, so Fighter regained the lead by two digits (74:64). From that shock Sutjeska could not recover. Until the last minute of the match, the Fighter had experienced the advantage, so he managed to achieve a new, fifth victory in this year's edition of the ABA 2 League.
And the next game is played by Fighter in Cacak. On Sunday, within the KLS with the Danube.
ABA League 2 - Round 6:
Freedom T. - Wide 88: 86 *
Spars - Helios 70:71
Borac Č. - Sutjeska 81:69



By: Đurđe Mecanin / Nikola Minovic
